docs.title: Welcome to LoomPay—the next evolution of digital banking!
docs.text:
We're building a borderless financial bridge that connects crypto assets with the global fiat payment network, empowering individuals and businesses to spend, send, and manage digital wealth seamlessly in the real world.

Create your LoomPay account, receive your virtual or physical card, fund it with stablecoins or crypto, and start spending globally—fast, frictionless, and free from borders!

docs.title: What is Loompay?
docs.text:
LoomPay bridges the gap between Web3 digital assets and Web2 payment rails. Today, most online and offline transactions—e-commerce, gaming, advertising—rely on bank transfers, cash, credit cards, or QR codes. All require intermediaries like Visa, Mastercard, or PayPal.

Meanwhile, Web3 users hold billions of dollars in stablecoins(USDT, USDC, etc.) and crypto assets ( ETH, BTC, etc.)—assets that are liquid and global, but not directly spendable. LoomPay solves this.

Our Solution

Loompay partners with Visa/Mastercard payment networks and licensed e-money issuers to enable crypto-to-fiat transactions instantly: Users deposit USDT or other stablecoins into their Loompay wallet.

  • Loompay converts the crypto to fiat USD and allows users to pay via Visa/Mastercard at any supported merchant.
  • Merchants receive fiat, while users spend crypto seamlessly.

Vision & Mission Our vision is to create a borderless banking ecosystem — one that empowers people to control, move, and spend their money freely, no matter where they are or what currency they use.

“We believe in a future where financial freedom is not defined by geography, banks, or borders — but by access, choice, and technology.”

Our mission is simple: To make crypto usable in everyday life, while preserving the transparency, efficiency, and inclusivity that define the Web3 revolution.

docs.title: Payment Cards
docs.text:
LoomPay offers Visa and Mastercard payment cards issued through regulated partners.

Use these cards to spend your crypto directly at merchants worldwide. Add them to Apple Pay or Google Pay for tap-to-pay transactions.

Your funds are instantly converted from USDT or other stablecoins to fiat, ensuring smooth, borderless payments.

docs.title: Virtual Bank Accounts
docs.text:
LoomPay provides USD and EUR virtual bank accounts powered by trusted financial institutions.

These accounts let you move between fiat and crypto using simple Wire, SEPA, or ACH transfers.

Deposited fiat is automatically converted to USDT and sent to your LoomPay Wallet for instant use.

docs.title: Card System
docs.text:
Loompay offers secured credit cards that let you spend crypto as fiat. All cards are denominated in USD.

How to issue a card:

The Loompay Secured Card is issued seamlessly through the Loompay.io platform with a fully automated, on-chain system.

Upon sign-up or wallet connection, each user receives a pre-issued card and wallet—ready to activate in seconds.

docs.title: 1. Issuance Flow
docs.text:
1. The user signs in via wallet or email.
  2. Upon login, Loompay automatically creates a secure wallet and a pre-issued card profile for the user.
  3. The virtual card is automatically activated with an initial monthly spending limit of $2,000.
  4. After successful KYC verification, the card’s spending limits are instantly upgraded, enabling full global usage.

docs.title: Card Types
docs.text:
• Virtual Card: Instantly issued and activated after login. It can be used for online payments or added to mobile wallets for contactless transactions.
  • Physical Card: Available after KYC verification and shipped within 5–10 business days. Ideal for in-store purchases and ATM withdrawals.

docs.title: 6. Spending & Transactions
docs.text:
Once activated, users can spend crypto effortlessly at any Visa/Mastercard merchant worldwide.

Loompay automatically converts digital assets to fiat at the moment of transaction—no manual steps required.

Supported Activities:

  • Online purchases, subscriptions, and e-commerce payments.
  • In-store POS and global ATM withdrawals.
  • Crypto-to-fiat conversion powered by Loompay's Auto-Convert Engine.

Core Features:

  • Auto-Convert Engine: Instantly swaps crypto to fiat at the best rate.
  • Spending Analytics: Tracks expenses, generates reports, and assigns a Web3 credit score.
  • Instant Notifications: Real-time updates for every transaction.
  • Multi-chain Support: Compatible with Ethereum, TON, Tron, BNB, and Solana ecosystems….

docs.title: 1. Introduction
docs.text: The Loompay Wallet is your central hub for digital finances—a secure, unified place to deposit, hold, convert, and spend crypto and fiat. LoomPay connects your on-chain assets to everyday payments. Deposit funds, top up your card, convert to fiat instantly at checkout, and withdraw as needed—all from a single, easy-to-use interface.

docs.title: 2. How to Deposit (Top-Up)
docs.text:
Step 1 — Access & Sign in

Go to https://loompay.io and sign in. From the homepage you can authenticate either by email/password or by using “E-Connect Wallet” to connect a supported crypto wallet.

Step 2 — Start a Deposit

Once signed in, open the dashboard and click the Deposit button.

Step 3 — Choose Chain & Wallet

Select the blockchain (chain) you want to deposit on (e.g., Ethereum, BSC, Tron). Then choose the corresponding wallet/address shown for that chain and send assets from your external wallet to the displayed address.

Notes:

  • Always double-check the selected chain and address. Sending tokens to the wrong chain may result in permanent loss.
  • Follow on-screen instructions for any memo / tag / destination tag required by the selected chain or token.
  • Deposit confirmations depend on the blockchain — the app will display the deposit status and final credit once the required on-chain confirmations are reached.
  • Some fiat/SEPA/Wire/ACH methods may require KYC verification before funds are credited.

docs.title: 3. How to Withdraw
docs.text:
Step 1 — Sign in: Log in at https://loompay.io (email or E-Connect Wallet).

Step 2 — Open Withdraw: From the dashboard click Withdraw.

Step 3 — Select Asset & Destination: Choose the asset (crypto or fiat), pick the destination type (external wallet address for crypto) enter the amount, and confirm the destination details.

Notes & Best Practices

  • For crypto withdrawals: ensure the destination network matches the asset (e.g., USDT on TRON vs USDT on Ethereum).
  • For fiat withdrawals: ensure your bank details are matched exactly; some fiat withdrawals require additional verification and processing time.
  • Withdrawals are subject to network fees, withdrawal limits, and KYC/AML checks as applicable.
